reviewtext: I just can't fathom how a dry tape can clean all that well. I also wonder how this can clean the record heads being that it never has you press the record button (probably doesn't clean the record heads is my guess) However it is by far the simplest to use! Even my Mom could do it! That's got to be worth something. I think I'll give it to my Mom!
summary: Don't know if it works well but I still like it because it is idiot proof!
